headline.main: BRITAIN WELCOMES SHIP BILL DECISION; Relief in London at Passage Tempered by Effect of the Relatively Close Vote

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Friday, Nov. 14 -- Passage by the House of Representatives at Washington of the Neutrality Act amendments was welcomed here late last night with considerable pleasure on all sides. The action was viewed as another important step by the United States involving great practical advantages to Britain and her Russian ally.
abstract: Hears U S Amb Winant and Adm Sir A D Pound

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: NAVAL VOLUNTEER RESERVE AUXILIARY PATROL CLUB, ROYAL
